title: What Beatles songs did John Lennon sing lead vocals on? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s a huge list and Pail’s is equally as big. All the Beatles songs released between 1962–1970 that featured John Lennon as the sole, primary, or otherwise the more dominant lead vocalist: Please, Please Me • Ask Me Why • Misery • Anna (Go to Him) • Baby It’s You • Twist and Shout • From Me to You • Thank You Girl • I’ll Get You • You’ve Really Got a Hold on Me • Money (That’s What I Want) • It Won’t Be Long • Please Mr. Postman • All I’ve Got to Do • Little Child • Not a Second Time • I Want to Hold Your Hand • This Boy • You Can’t Do That • I Should Have Known Better • If I Fell • Tell Me Why • I Call Your Name • A Hard Day’s Night • I’ll Cry Instead • I’ll Be Back • Slow Down • Anytime at All • When I Get Home • I’m a Loser • Every Little Thing • I Don’t Want to Spoil the Party • No Reply • Eight Days a Week • Rock and Roll Music • Mr. Moonlight • I Feel Fine • Ticket to Ride • Yes, It Is • You’ve Got to Hide Your Love Away • You’re Going to Lose that Girl • Help! • Bad Boy • Dizzy, Miss Lizzy • It’s Only Love • Norwegian Wood (This Bird Has Flown) • Run for Your Life • In My Life • Nowhere Man • The Word • Girl • Tomorrow Never Knows • Rain • Doctor Robert • And Your Bird Can Sing • I’m Only Sleeping • She Said, She Said • Strawberry Fields Forever • A Day in the Life • Good Morning, Good Morning • Being for the Benefit of Mr. Kite! • Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds • Baby, You’re a Rich Man • All You Need is Love • I Am the Walrus • Across the Universe • Hey Bulldog • Revolution 1 • Everybody’s Got Something to Hide Except Me and My Monkey • Revolution • Cry, Baby Cry • Sexy Sadie • Yer Blues • Dear Prudence • Glass Onion • Happiness is a Warm Gun • The Continuing Story of Bungalow Bill • I’m So Tired • Julia • Maggie Mae • (Can You) Dig It • Don’t Let Me Down • One After 909 • Dig a Pony • I Want You (She’s So Heavy) • The Ballad of John and Yoko • Come Together • Sun King • Mean Mr. Mustard • Polythene Pam • Because If there’s any songs that aren’t listed, it’s either because John Lennon did not sing lead vocals on the songs, the songs weren’t released until after 1970, John Lennon sang lead on the songs 50/50 with Paul McCartney, or Paul McCartney was the dominant lead vocalist in the songs. I have not listed any of the songs that are instrumental or ones that aren’t considered to be actual songs.
